message: Let's start with a fair split, no need to negotiate too hard!
You said it's a fair split, but I think I'm worth more!
I'm willing to compromise, but I think I deserve a bit more now that the money is worth less!
You think you deserve more, but I'm not convinced. I'm willing to give you a bit more, but I'm not going to get taken advantage of!
I'm starting to think we're not going to come to an agreement at this rate. I'm willing to compromise again, but I need to think about my own interests.
You're not budging, I'll make a serious offer. This is my last chance to make a good deal, don't blow it!
I'm not going to give up yet. I'll make one last offer, and if you don't take it, I'm walking away.
